Package it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.View

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    InterfaceNetworkHandlerRMI
    This is the remote interface of Network handler RMI that being downloaded and used by server to send the request messages an to obtain the responses from a client.
    Observer<T>
    Interface that implements an observer of a specified type of message
    StateVirtualView
    This interface it is used to implement the different state of the server inside the virtual view during the match.
    Terminal
    This interface is used to implemets the two different technolgies(GUI or CLI) to aks the input at the user and to show it all the information of the match
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AllPlayerAreActive
    This class implement the logic of the server about the insertion of new connection in case of there aren't players disconnected
    AppClient  
    AppServer  
    CLI
    This class implements the CLI with all the method needed to handle it
    Connection
    This class represent a connection between the client and the server and can be implemented in different ways The implementation depends by thecnology
    ConnectionRMI
    This class extend and implement the class connection and represent the connection beetwen the server and the client that it will use RMI
    ConnectionSocket
    This class extend and implement the class connection and represent the connection beetwen the server and the client that they will use the sockets to comunicate
    NetworkHandlerRMI
    This class implements a network handler that handles the comunication through RMI
    NetworkHandlerSocket
    This class implements a network handler that handles the comunication through the sockets
    Observable<T>
    This class implements the logic of the pattern Observable
    PrivateView
    This class implements the view of the client that handles the inputs the CLI or GUI and memorizes the copy Immutable of the model
    SomePlayerAreNotActive
    This class implement the logic of the server about the insertion of new connection in case of some players are disconnected
    StartLogin
    this Is the initial state of the server in virtual view In this state the new connections are inserted and become players for the match.
    TimerAFK
    This is a static class that provides the needed methods to handle the afk timer
    View
    This class implements the server and the virtual View
